headers.value: frame-src 'self' blob: https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://player.vimeo.com https://vimeo.com https://drive.google.com https://docs.google.com https://apis.google.com https://accounts.google.com https://www.facebook.com https://web.facebook.com; img-src * data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://apis.google.com https://f.vimeocdn.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://f.vimeocdn.com; font-src 'self' https://f.vimeocdn.com;
